title: Could 'mindful Lego' (designed for adults) sort out your anxiety?
text:
People will try anything to find inner peace, and often spend vast sums of money in the process. Some do yoga, others anoint themselves with psychoactive toxins from Brazilian tree frogs. Some even subscribe to Gwyneth Paltrow’s wellness website, Goop. Inner peace is big business.

The therapeutic practice du jour for many who want metaphysical balance in these stressful times is mindfulness, a Buddhist-derived meditation practice that, according to Mindful magazine, is “the basic human ability to be fully present, aware of where we are and what we’re doing, and not overly reactive or overwhelmed by what’s going on around us”.
